title: Kendra Andrews, Marques Johnson
description:
Zach and ESPN's Kendra Andrews discuss Steph Curry's foot injury, the state of the Warriors, and the Western Conference playoff race. Then Marques Johnson joins to talk about the Bucks gearing up for a title defense. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
